46.eng-name: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Hurairah that the Prophet said:"If a slave steals, then sell him, even for half price." (Hasan) Abu 'Abdur-Rahman (An-Nasai) said: 'Umar bin Abi Salamah is not strong in Hadith

chapter.eng-name: Cutting (The thief's hand off) while traveling
